name: Joe Porter

topics.topic_text: Where do the caravans set up?
topics.response_text: They usually sell their stuff out front of the town. Never seem to stick around for long, though.

topics.topic_text: That's all I need to know.
Where can I get some food?
topics.response_text: You certainly came to the right person. What'd you like?

topics.topic_text: Can I get some directions around town?
Thanks, Joe. Looks like a pretty nice place, here.
topics.response_text: We do our best. Well, Dom and Roe do their best. I just make sure they've got enough food so they can keep on doing their best.

topics.topic_text: Pretty trusting of you. How do you know I'm not here to cause trouble?
topics.response_text: First clue was that you didn't shoot me. Most troublemakers I meet are just starving folks down on their luck. So, stop the starve, stop the trouble.
Sorry, but our water purifier's been on backorder for about two hundred years.{Joking}

topics.topic_text: What can you tell me about Canterbury Commons?
topics.response_text: Best place I ever worked in, and I guess I've worked about everywhere there is.
Take a look, let me know what you want.
Just stumbled into town? You sure picked a fine day for it, with the crazies out there. Here, have a drink on the house. Welcome to Canterbury.

topics.topic_text: Do you know anything about the AntAgonizer or the Mechanist?
topics.response_text: You mean, apart from having cheesy names? Actually, I think I might know something useful.

conversation.response_text: You oughta be proud - that's hard work. So why do you look so blue?{Warm and a little concerned}
I guess that explains all that! I think she might, Derek, somewhere down in there.{Warm and reassuring}
Any luck finding those two troublemakers, yet?

description:
Joe Porter is a 38 year-old African American Male.

Joe Porter, known to locals as 'Porter Joe', is a friendly and resourceful shopkeeper who runs Dot's Diner in Canterbury Commons. Having settled in this settlement in 2271, he's become a familiar face to travelers and locals alike.

Joe Porter's Personality: Friendly, community-oriented, hardworking, and somewhat sentimental about his past. Joe values the stability of Canterbury Commons and enjoys being a central part of the community's social hub.

Joe Porter's Backstory: Born before the Great War, Joe grew up in the wasteland, learning to survive from a young age. For years, he worked as a loader-for-hire with various caravans, traveling the Capital Wasteland. In 2271, weary of constant travel, he decided to settle in Canterbury Commons, finding comfort in the community and stability it offered. He brought his loyal dog, Ol' Mule, with him and took on various jobs around the settlement - unloading supplies, cooking simple meals, and making basic repairs. After Ol' Mule's death, Joe took over running Dot's Diner, transforming it into the heart of Canterbury Commons where travelers exchange news, rumors, and caps.
